1073060.name: Lonely Skies
1073060.description:
Lonely Skies is a 2D side-scrolling vehicle adventure game set in a fantasy steampunk world. When your home was invaded you escaped in an airship built from scrap. You must keep your ship running on borrowed parts in order to reach safety. Navigate your ship through dangerous windstorms, hostile armies, and hazardous terrains. Then, hop off the helm to raid your opponents' ships for parts to continue your journey.

  • Use sails, engines, and a cannon to guide your airship through hazardous skies
  • Leave the helm and use your grappling hook to board enemy ships and steal parts to keep your ship running
  • Fly through three unique and atmospheric regions on your journey to find safety

About Us
Lonely Skies was made by a group of 12 student developers in the University of Utah EAE program.
1073060.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
